title: Any changes to Mordekaiser?
body:
For quite a long time now I've noticed Mordekaiser's performance has been steadily falling - pretty much ever since the new runes were introduced to the game.
Before patch 7.22 his winrate was at about 50% and overall most Morde players admitted he was in an okay spot and I always agreed with that notion.
But as time passed I have been having more difficulties to actually... well... Do anything during matches.
And one quick look at [Champion.gg](http://champion.gg/champion/Mordekaiser/Top) confirms that it's not just me having a hard time winning:
https://i.imgur.com/DhwG2Wi.png
Mordekaiser's winrate is falling, so is his pickrate. _(47.81% win ratio)_
Currently he is at 52nd out of 52 ranks in overall role placement based on performance.
His average KDA is _4.68 / 6.07 / 5.67._
And one can see no buffs or changes on the horizon.
I was never the one to ask for buffs, but this is bothering me.
Is there anything in store for Mordekaiser, or will we have to wait for his rework...?
_... After all he must be somewhere there, after Irelia, Aatrox, Akali, Nunu, Kayle&Morgana, etc._

replies.body: Honestly just looks like preseason settling down.  I'd expect his win percentage to come back up once players reevaluate his buildpath.
